nodes.text: A Body-Rig was a small one-man vehicle designed and released by Kenner in 1985 as part of their Star Wars: The Power of the Force toy line. Also known as Single Body Transport Vehicles, they were even smaller than the Mini-Rigs. Two of the vehicles appeared in Star Wars: Droids: the Imperial Sniper and the One-Man Sand Skimmer. In Europe, these vehicles were sold in a closed box, while Kenner released them in the US on a blister card.
